mapper.insert: insert into Activity_Master (activityNo, activityStartTime, groupNo, sumAccount, activityEndTime, activityName) values (#{activityno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activitystarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sumaccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Activity_Master set activityStartTime = #{activitystarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sumAccount = #{sumaccount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, activityEndTime = #{activityendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activityName = #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where activityNo = #{activityno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select activityNo, activityStartTime, groupNo, sumAccount, activityEndTime, activityName from Activity_Master
